subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored Miami’s final 17 points in a furious one-man rally, finishing with 37 as the visiting Heat pulled out a 101-98 victory over the Nets.
snippet: LeBron James scored Miami’s final 17 points in a furious one-man rally, finishing with 37 as the visiting Heat pulled out a 101-98 victory over the Nets.
